definitions.definition: A deposition of sediment over a long period of time by a river ; an alluvial layer .
Alluvial soil ; specifically, in Australia , gold -bearing alluvial soil.

main_definition: ( countable ) A deposition of sediment over a long period of time by a river ; an alluvial layer .
secondary_definitions: Alluvial soil ; specifically, in Australia , gold -bearing alluvial soil.
